Package client

Class ClientHumanTUI

java.lang.Object
client.ClientHumanTUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientTUI
public class ClientHumanTUI extends Object implements ClientTUI
This class implements the client TUI for the Dots and Boxes game. It prompts the user for the server's IP address and port, establishes a connection to the server and allows the user to interact with the (created) game by entering commands.

      public void doSendHelloCommand()

    • doSendQueueCommand

      public void doSendQueueCommand()
      Sends a "Queue" command to the server. Toggles the client's queued status, depending on the current status. Prints a message to the user.
      Specified by:
      doSendQueueCommand in interface ClientTUI

    • sendError

      public void sendError(String error)

    • doSendMoveCommand

      public void doSendMoveCommand(int location)
      Sends a "Move" command to the server, if the client is in a game, and it is the client's turn. Also informs the user if the move is not valid.
      Specified by:
      doSendMoveCommand in interface ClientTUI
      Parameters:
      location - the location of the move to be made.

    • doSendLogInCommand

      public void doSendLogInCommand()
      Sends a "Log in" command to the server. Prompts the user for a username and sends it to the server. Waits for a response from the server before proceeding.
      Specified by:
      doSendLogInCommand in interface ClientTUI

    • createGame

      public void createGame(String name1, String name2)
      Creates a new game between two players and initializes the game state. Prints information about the players and the initial game state.
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface ClientTUI
      Parameters:
      name1 - The name of the first player.
      name2 - The name of the second player.

    • receiveGameOver

      public void receiveGameOver(String reason, String winner)
      Receives the game over information from the server and prints the result. Resets the current game state.
      Specified by:
      receiveGameOver in interface ClientTUI
      Parameters:
      reason - The reason for the game over, such as DRAW, VICTORY, or DISCONNECT.
      winner - The name of the winner, if applicable.

    • receiveMove

      public void receiveMove(int location)
      Receives a move from the opponent and updates the game state accordingly. Prints information about the move, the current game state, and the scores.
      Specified by:
      receiveMove in interface ClientTUI
      Parameters:
      location - The location where the opponent has made a move.

    • initializeClient

      public boolean initializeClient()
      This method initializes the client by prompting the user for the server's IP address and port. In case the connection fails, the client does not crash. The user is prompted to try again, after a while.
      Returns:
      true if the connection was successful, false otherwise.

    • cycleThroughCommands

      public void cycleThroughCommands()
      This method continuously accepts user commands (from the console) for interacting with the game.

    • runTUI

      public void runTUI()
      This method runs the TUI for the game client. It prompts the user for the server's IP address and port, establishes a connection to the server, and continuously accepts user commands for interacting with the game.
      Specified by:
      runTUI in interface ClientTUI

    • doHelp

      public void doHelp()
      Method that prints the help menu, dependent on if there is currently a game being played or not it prints additional information.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Minimalistic main that calls the run method of the TUI.
